DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ASTRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ implant , patient totally edentulous upper jaw poor bone quality quantity , provisional artificial teeth attach within 24 hour . The primary objective investigate implant survival rate .
DOC.brief_title: Study ASTRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ Implants Patients Missing All Teeth Upper Jaw , Restored With Provisional Teeth Within 24 Hours
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Aged 20 year History totally edentulous maxilla least three month Radiographic find indicate bone quality class 3 4 ( Lekholm Zarb ) maxilla Radiographic find indicate bone quantity class C , D E ( Lekholm Zarb ) maxilla Presence natural teeth , partial prosthesis and/or implant mandible , within position 3545 ( accord FDI digit system ) Deemed investigator likely present initially stable implant situation suitable immediate loading . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity Known suspect current malignancy History radiation head neck region History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Uncontrolled Diabetes Mellitus Corticosteroids medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration History bone augmentation maxilla within 6 month prior surgery Known pregnancy time enrolment Present alcohol and/or drug abuse Current use tobacco history tobacco use within 6 month prior surgery Need interpreter
DOC.keyword: Jaw , Edentulous ( maxilla , poor bone quality quantity )
